Transforming
Waste Into Value

We supply quality oil byproducts nationwide and around the world.

At JST Global, we provide sustainable solutions for animal fats and other oil byproducts - diverting them from potential waste outletsâ€¦ and transforming them into valued inputs for essential industries around the world.

Reliable, Flexible,
Customized

Our reputation is built on unwavering integrity, and our ability to consistently deliver for our customers with technical expertise, operational flexibility and scale, and product quality.

With operating facilities in Houston, Texas and Dakota City, Nebraska, we have the storage and processing capabilities to meet exacting product specifications for our customers. Our operating footprint and logistics solutions enable us to service US and global customers via rail, truck, or vessel.

The Industries
We Serve

Renewable
Energy

We are proud to be a part of the evolution towards sustainable energy solutions to fuel our future. At our facilities, we process recycled animal fats and oil byproducts to produce sustainable inputs for clean energy producers.

Our scale, processing capabilities, and operational flexibility ensure we are a reliable source of low carbon feedstocks for renewable fuel producers. We aim to create a positive impact upon the wider world, working with you to supply precisely what you need.

Consumer
Products

We maintain the highest levels of quality to ensure we service customers in consumer products industries with raw materials they can trust. It is why we are the trusted partners of customers producing edible shortenings and cooking oils, body soaps, and more.

Industrial
Oleochemicals

We offer high-quality products to industrial customers, who utilize animal fats and other oil byproducts in products consumers use everyday, including:

  • Cosmetics
  • Coatings, sealants, and lubricants
  • Household and industrial cleaning products
